page.title: 08SURVEY OF HOMES IN CAPEL
page.content: We did a survey of the houses in Capel_le_Ferne and the materials used in making them.The most popular type of home is the bungalow. In some roads they are mostly semi_detached,whilst in others they are detached. The most recent homes have tended to be houses, no doubt to save land. There are no terraced houses and the only flats are in large older houses. Nearly all the properties are built of brick,though there are some older homes built from flint and even wood.A good number of houses are pebble dashed.The roofs are tiled or of slate.There are hardly any houses in the village over 100 years old. Quite a few homes were built in the 20's and 30's, but the bulk of house or rather bungalow building came after 1935 when the A20 was completed.
